bibl.title: P.Oxy. 24.2408: A Revised Edition
bibl.note: Paper read at the 28th International Congress of Papyrology, Barcelona, 2016. Refers to other pieces of correspondence emanating from the office of the praefectus annonae Alexandriae: P. Ryl. IV, 652 (= S.B. XXIV, 12262); P. Lips. Inv. 29 (= S.B. XVI, 12580); P. Vindob. Graec. Inv. 25835 (= S.B. XXIV, 16261); P. Turner 45.
bibl.seg: 145.4 P. Lips. Inv. 29 P. Oxy. XXIV, 2408 P. Ryl. IV, 652 P. Turner 45 P. Vindob. Graec. Inv. 25835
James G. Keenan, P.Oxy. 24.2408: A Revised Edition.

Paper read at the 28th International Congress of Papyrology, Barcelona, 2016. Refers to other pieces of correspondence emanating from the office of the praefectus annonae Alexandriae: P. Ryl. IV, 652 (= S.B. XXIV, 12262); P. Lips. Inv. 29 (= S.B. XVI, 12580); P. Vindob. Graec. Inv. 25835 (= S.B. XXIV, 16261); P. Turner 45.
